name: Hunted (itch) (HAS-IT GAMES)
description:
Hunted is a short, pixelated horror game.

As a Ranger for a nature reserve, you are tasked to investigate reports of illegal camping within the forest, unaware that a powerful beast has claimed the territory you are setting foot in and seeks to devour any trespassers. You must attempt to escape with your life...

Game Length: 8-12 mins

! Contains Flashing Lights and Jump Scares !

I'm throwing my hat into the ring with my first game, developed solely by me over the course of about 6 months (off and on, learning all the skills necessary from scratch).  Unfortunately yeah, it's only a short game. It's more of a proof of concept or a expression of interest really. To see if I could make something people might like, and maybe scare a few in the process. If you want to see more of these characters, or want to help me make other games in the future,  please consider donating a buck or two through the "pay what you want" function.

Thank you!

"Be Careful... Over and Out."
